editorialNotes.standard: A phenomenon from the start, Pokémon GO hasn’t stopped evolving. Since launch, the best-in-class location-based AR game has expanded with countless improvements. Hatch eggs while the game runs in the background. Battle other trainers with your favorite creatures. Join memorable community day events. With a steady stream of awesome updates and hundreds of iconic creatures to catch, Niantic’s groundbreaking hit just keeps getting better.

editorialNotes.tagline: Can you build the best base?
editorialNotes.standard: It's hard to understate Clash of Clans’ massive influence in establishing complex strategic multiplayer on mobile. Over time the build, train, and attack gameplay has been honed to perfection through fantastic updates. We still love logging on to find that our meticulously placed and upgraded fortifications survived another onslaught, and to experience the rush of victory after our carefully assembled attack force yet again smashed through enemy defenses.

ios.subtitle: Open and stack the new states

editorialNotes.standard: The cheerful humor of the Bikini Bottom crew keeps us smiling as we juggle orders in chaotic cooking challenges.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Build the metropolis of your dreams in this free-to-play city builder from EA. Stunning graphics, intuitive controls, and addictive mechanics make the experience truly extraordinary. Behind its polished gleam, SimCity BuildIt retains the same high-quality gameplay fans have come to expect from this enduring franchise.

Colourful chaos awaits in our 2016 iPhone Game of the Year. Supercell’s awesome card battler delivers excellent deck-building mechanics and fast-paced fights in a package that’s easy to understand and undeniably fun. Upgrading, unlocking and experimenting with cards gives the game endless replayability, and deciding just where to drop your heroes makes each battle distinct. But no matter how good your deck is, there’s no substitute for skill and quick thinking.
editorialNotes.short: Collect powerful cards and crush your competition.

ios.subtitle: Make a toast with your allies

editorialNotes.standard: Years ago, Plants vs. Zombies defined a genre with its fresh concept, undeniable charm, and innovative, balanced gameplay. Now the undead have risen again, bringing with them new time-traveling tales and a massive slew of new zombies and plants. Whether you stomp enemies without paying a dime or buy new experimental plants and power-ups with In-App Purchases, the result is the same: an incredible sequel that's fresh and fun throughout, reminding us why we fell in love with this world in the first place.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

ios.subtitle: Chef, time to cook tasty food!

editorialNotes.standard: Dominate the lanes of this highly polished multiplayer online battle arena as a rocket-loving robot, a bunny-like mage, or another unique hero from a list of dozens.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.short: Enable the "Farm to Table" mode to play this relaxing idle game in a new way.

editorialNotes.standard: Fast-paced, accessible, and utterly brilliant, Marvel Snap’s quick, competitive matches are packed with seemingly infinite possibilities. Do you annoy opponents by dominating the first round’s playing field with Squirrel Girl’s rodent hordes? Or do you build your 12-card deck around the complementary card effects of the Guardians of the Galaxy? There’s no wrong answer. Fantastic animations, abilities, and art that perfectly channel the personality of the comics help make this one of the best card games on the App Store.

Presented as a holotable full of Star Wars champions, Galaxy of Heroes lets you form a team and leap into thrilling turn-based battles. Playing as Luke Skywalker, Boba Fett, Ahsoka Tano and other characters from the films and animated series, you’ll need smart tactics to beat enemy squads. Missions take you from Hoth to Tatooine to Imperial ships—and gorgeous graphics make every sabre slash and blaster shot look spectacular. Even when you’re not fighting, though, the piles of unlockable characters, gear and abilities ensure you’ll have plenty to do.

ios.subtitle: Lay as many eggs as you can

name: Forge of Empires: Build a City

editorialNotes.short: Turn touchdowns into treasure in an American Football special.

name: Where is Your Daddy: Boss Baby

ios.subtitle: Baby Pranks Sim Hide and Seek

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: Reworked and retrofitted for gaming on the go, League of Legends: Wild Rift brings the franchise’s twitchy thrills, unmatched depth, and nail-biting tactics to iPhone and iPad. Each match is a fast-paced 5v5 tug-of-war. Pick from dozens of champions and head onto the battlefield, charging down one of three lanes as you help your team destroy the enemy’s Nexus. Combining slick, accessible touchscreen controls with the tactical brilliance that turned League of Legends into a worldwide sensation, Wild Rift is a must-play MOBA for newcomers and vets alike.

advisories: Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References
Infrequent/Mild Alcohol, Tobacco, or Drug Use or References

editorialNotes.standard: No mere port of a pre-existing classic, this is a stunning reimagining of perhaps our most beloved business-building sim. We love snagging new card packs to build bigger and better rides, and our inner Walt Disney obsesses over the perfect placement of attractions, restaurants, and, of course, restrooms—you never know when a customer is going to find one of our roller coaster creations a little too intense.
